volunteer_experience.info: I was a part of the literary team which was responsible for teaching the children in villages. I also attended 7 days NSS Camp in which we build a road in the village. Took active part in cloth collection and distribution drive. Did survey in village to get good data about the conditions of people in villages.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: National Service Scheme ,IIT Kharagpur
volunteer_experience.title: Team Leader

projects: [{"title":"Hindustan Unilever Limited: TechSpark","description":"National Finalist and Campus Winners( IIT Kharagpur), in the Pan IIT technical competition, TechSpark organised by Hindustan Unilever Limited. Conceptualized an end-to-end solution for reusing and/or disposing 28 billion sachets produced annually by HUL. The solution involved collection, segregation and transformation into reusable products generating large-scale skilled/unskilled employment in a country like India and reducing waste deposition thereby saving the environment."},{}]
